name: Briddick Webb | Bellingham Real Estate Agent | RE/MAX Whatcom County, Inc.

google_reviews.author: Gus Deluca
google_reviews.review: Briddick is the best, most patient agent on the planet. It literally took us close to four years to find a house we liked, and he was with us, with tons of energy and enthusiasm, throughout the whole process!

google_reviews.author: Nancy Shogren
google_reviews.review:
Briddick and his team make the buying (and selling) process super easy and comfortable.  We just purchased a condo and we were unavailable to go see it when it came on the market.   Briddick went over there himself, took videos for us, checked it out thoroughly and we made an offer for it based on his recommendation without having physically seen it. It closed today, we got our keys and his assistant Jillian opened the door for us to our new home with a thoughtful welcome gift.

Approximately 6 years ago Briddick sold another condo for us in 5 days with multiple over-ask offers.

A great guy, a great team.  We highly recommend them.

John and Nancy Shogren

google_reviews.author: Jordan Kirbyson
google_reviews.review:
It is my pleasure to recommend Briddick Webb and his team (notably his right hand Woman, Jillian Hawley) to anyone looking for a Realtor Team that will give you solace and peace of mind when you choose to purchase a home or sell your existing home.

Briddick and Jillian offer a caring and compassionate local approach when working with yourself to either buy or sell. When you work with The Briddick Webb Team, you, as their client come first. Through your input they will tailor their approach to achieve the goals that you desire in any real estate transaction.

We presented the Briddick Webb Team with a multilayered real estate scenario where we were selling our current home, while purchasing another home and a storage unit. The Briddick Webb Team worked with ourselves closely to achieve our desired goals. They offered guidance and support and truly listened to our needs and established a plan to achieve our goals. No matter what obstacles that presented themselves during the process, their caring and compassionate approach found a solution that was sound while taking care of our needs.

Whenever I would request anything from Briddick, his response was always, No Problem! This proved to be true as he and his team were always able to deliver on their word, and we were able to realize our goals.

If you are looking for a Realtor whom knows the market and puts you as their client first, we recommend The Briddick Webb Team with highest regards. Briddick and his Team are simply best at what they do!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for the very kind review Jordan!

google_reviews.author: Ryan Rotz
google_reviews.review: Briddick and Jillian did a great job helping us buy our home, which included negotiating the price downunheard of in today's market. Briddick has sold a lot of homes over the years and has knowledge that you'll find very important, whether you're an experienced buyer or not. He also did a great job helping us make decisions. There's a reason Briddick is a top performer and has the reputation he does. I recommend him!

ownerResponse.text: Ryan, it was a pleasure working with and Amy (and Pearl). Cant wait to see what you do with the place

google_reviews.author: Scott Ogden
google_reviews.review: Briddick represented us as the buyer's agent.  We are very particular and he did a fantastic job of listening to what we wanted and guiding us away from some likely duds, eventually finding a home for us that hadn't even been listed yet.   Thanks to Jillian's guidance, the closing went smoothly.   I have no hesitation recommending Briddick to anyone I know in Bellingham.

ownerResponse.text: It was such a pleasure working with you guys!!! Thank you for the kind review.

google_reviews.author: Jill Ankerson
google_reviews.review: We began looking for a place a few years back online.   Briddick reached out both online and a couple of calls in an unobtrusive way.  (we love his style).  His assistant Jillian was  most helpful in showing us places.   We completely changed what/where we were looking and they rolled along with us.  It was an easy purchase with two kind and professional people.  We highly recommend Remax, Briddick Webb and Jillian.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much for the kind review Jill. It was a pleasure working with you!!

google_reviews.author: Thomas Salmon
google_reviews.review: Our experience with Briddick Webb and RE/MAX was superb.  Briddick and his associate, Jillian Hawley, were wonderful to work with.  They kept us informed regarding both the sale of one house and the purchase of another.  Their guidance and suggestions throughout the process were right on target and the closing process was the easiest that I have ever experienced (note: I have purchased and sold 7 houses over the years).  Briddick has vast knowledge of the real estate market in Whatcom County and is highly professional and makes the selling and buying experience a very pleasant one.  He and Jillian handled all the details promptly and efficiently and went the extra mile to assist us in both our search for a new property and the sale of our last property.  I would highly recommended their services to anyone looking for a very positive and easy selling and/or buying experience.

google_reviews.author: William Coleman
google_reviews.review:
We chose Briddick Webb to sell our two rental properties, about three years apart, and must say that they were the quickest and easiest experiences weve ever had dealing with real estate. His professional knowledge and ability to guide us through the process, with the excellent, caring follow-up by his assistant, Jillian, gave us confidence to relax as everything unfolded. Briddick and his team were always (really, always!) available to answer questions, problem-solve issues, and be reassuring during the process. We give them the highest recommendation!!
-Donna and Bill Coleman

google_reviews.author: Susan Dalton
google_reviews.review:
I am so glad Briddick Webb was my realtor. He and his team were very helpful in making the process less of a burden for me, an out of state estate executor.
For example, one morning I called him about a problem that had come up. He was busy getting little ones ready for school and he told me he would figure something out and a few minutes later he called me back with a plan. It was such a relief for me, knowing that things would be taken care of.
I have a lot of respect for how Briddick conducts his business. I would, without hesitation, recommend Briddick and his team to anyone who was looking for the perfect realtor.

ownerResponse.text: Aw thank you so much for the kind review Sue!  It was a pleasure working with you

google_reviews.author: Rhonda Karp
google_reviews.review: Loved working with Briddick!  He is very competent and a true professional who is very knowledgeable about the real-estate market as well as very well connected to other services you may need.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much for the kind review Rhonda! Can't wait to celebrate with you once you arrive in town!

google_reviews.author: Melody McCall
google_reviews.review: Briddick helped me sell during my divorce which presents unique challenges. He was patient, helpful & very responsive. He helped during a difficult time and I will always appreciate his efforts! His team does great work in helping prepare to sell and get things ready so the seller can put their best foot forward. Briddick was always on top of things and very thorough. I would not hesitate to recommend Briddick and his team.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Melody. It was a pleasure helping you and Im so excited to see what the next chapter brings you.

google_reviews.author: BJ Block
google_reviews.review: Briddick recently listed and sold an investment home of ours here in Bellingham.  He and Jillian did an incredible job for us.  During the process, they communicated with us each step of the way so we always had daily and weekly progress reports,  we always felt looked after.    There were all kinds of small details they just took care of for us, whether it was a small fix on the house, or a unique detail in the photos and how the home was marketed, every step was world class.  I would highly recommend Briddick and have already passed his name on to some of our friends who are looking to sell this Spring.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for the kind review BJ!!!

google_reviews.author: Lexi March
google_reviews.review: Briddick and his team helped us navigate what turned out to be a difficult sale with ease and speed. We were blown away by the results we got from listening to his advice about how to prep for the sale, and his help navigating through the numerous offers ensured we chose the most qualified buyers that got our house sold. He has highly skilled people working with him as well, including the photographer he used for our listing pictures. Jillian was always so quick to answer questions and keep us updated as well. Can't speak highly enough of this team!

ownerResponse.text: Ahh thank you for the kind words Lexi. It was a pleasure working with you both

google_reviews.author: Matthew Zigulis
google_reviews.review: As a first time home buyer, Briddick and his team were the absolute best to work with. My fiance and I  had been working with him for well over a year trying to get a feel for the market before actually putting in any offers, and throughout the entire process Briddick was patient, knowledgeable, flexible, and willing to do anything for us. Every listing agent we met also had great things to say about Briddick and loved working with him as well. We were at a very competitive price point and did have our share of heartbreak, but Briddick was with us until the end, supporting us all the way until we finally found the perfect home. He, Jillian, and Tessa were tireless workers who always made us feel comfortable. I felt that they had our best interest at heart and would reccomend him and his team to anyone looking to buy/sell a home in Bellingham or its surrounding areas.

google_reviews.author: jennifer ackman
google_reviews.review: Briddick and Jillian were so kind and helpful. They made the home buying experience very easy. Jillian even went above and beyond with helping our other family members find rentals, which we were so grateful for! They were a pleasure to work with and we highly recommend them. Briddick really makes you feel important, and takes the time to reach out. We are so thankful for their help!

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much Jenny!!! So stoked for you both on this new adventure.

google_reviews.author: Joel Swenson
google_reviews.review: Briddick and his outstanding crew helped me buy my first house with my VA Home Loan in 2017, and helped me sell said house this year. Briddick and his team were on point every time through every step. I would recommend them for any veteran looking to use their VA Home Loan. Briddick went the extra mile to ensure we were ready to close on the date projected, and was super responsive whenever I had questions. Professional and to the point, Briddick and his team were up front and knowledgeable.

google_reviews.author: Alanna Cattaneo
google_reviews.review: Briddick and Jillian were two amazing resources and guides for buying our first home. They were responsive, insightful, and organized with every detail that came up for us as new home buyers. They truly went above and beyond to make sure our move in went smoothly and that we had everything we needed.

ownerResponse.text: It was such a pleasure working with you both! Cant to get to get together with you both soon

google_reviews.author: Raelyn Kaplan
google_reviews.review: Briddick is an excellent realtor. He and Jillian make an amazing team. They've been super responsive and easy to work with. I'd recommend Briddick to anyone looking to buy or sell a home.

google_reviews.author: Katie Granger
google_reviews.review: Briddick and Jillian were such a pleasure to work with when buying our house in Bellingham. They were so responsive, professional and enjoyable. Briddick's local knowledge was so valuable and Jillian was very communicative. They bent over backwards to make sure everything with the process went smoothly. If you're looking for an outstanding realtor, seriously look no further!

google_reviews.author: Paige B
google_reviews.review: Briddick was awesome to work with while trying to find a house. He listened to what my Husband and I were looking for, and updated our search online to show houses fitting that criteria. When we found houses we liked he was able to get us a viewing quickly. When we found the house we loved, he worked hard and got our offer accepted quickly. We will definitely be recommending him to family and friends looking to buy/sell a house.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much for the kind review. So stoked for your new home. What a deal!

google_reviews.author: james
google_reviews.review: I cannot express enough our appreciation and satisfaction with Briddick and Jillian for there assistance in leading and guiding us on our quest for a new home.   Prior to our meeting, I had read all of Briddicks reviews and now, through our time and shared experience, I can sincerely state that you could not meet any kinder, caring  and understanding individuals.  There knowledge and professionalism is simply unmatched and they made the entire process seem simple.  Briddick and Jillian provide so much more then exceptional service as they first and foremost, forge that service in friendship.  Thank you so very much.

google_reviews.author: Victoria Reyes
google_reviews.review: I have worked with Briddick and his team several times, and have always  had an amazing experience.  He is very knowledgeable, transparent, knows the market, an excellent communicator and stellar negotiator.  I would recommend him and his team to any of my friends and family that want to buy or sell in this market.  Thanks Briddick and team for all your hard work!

google_reviews.author: Emily Renteria
google_reviews.review: We had such a seamless experience buying our first house with Briddick, we made sure to work with him again when we were ready to sell! Briddick and his team made the entire process smooth and they kept us informed throughout each step. Our house was listed on a Thursday and sold on Friday, the next day! We couldnt be happier.

google_reviews.author: Jeremy Ferrera
google_reviews.review:
Being a real estate agent is not just a transactional business for Briddick. He strives to build ongoing relationships and his service does not stop after the purchase or the sale.

When we purchased our home, there were renters in it,  and we intended to move in as soon as the lease was up.  We had no experience with this kind of situation, and he helped walk us through treating the renters with respect while taking care of our own interests as we  navigated the final rent payments and deposit months after the purchase.

This being our 1st home, there were all kinds of questions and things we needed help with in the 1st year and Briddick was always available to  offer support and his expertise in solving the problems of being a home owner.   He's very well connected with top notch professionals to solve these problems.

He goes so far above and beyond what most agents would do.

He has treated those I refer to him in the same manner, and I trust him implicitly with any of my close friends and family.

google_reviews.author: Sherri Hall
google_reviews.review: When I made that difficult decision to sell our family home of 25 years,  I sought out Briddick Webb, as he came highly recommended by friends.  As a widow there was much emotion attached to this transition. Briddick and his team - Tessa and Jillian - are consummate professionals - knowledgeable, organized, extremely skilled in what they do.  Equally important they have been compassionate, supportive, and patient even when I got cold feet the week before putting the house on the market!  The selling process has been seamless. For this my sons and I are grateful and appreciative!

google_reviews.author: Carolyn DeLuca
google_reviews.review: Briddick and Jillian did a great job on our home purchase. They were always responsive and professional. Since we are out of town buyers, they helped us through the whole process including inspections, quotes for work to be done and their professional opinions. It was a very good experience and we highly recommend them.

google_reviews.author: jerab mom
google_reviews.review: Briddick shared his expertise and knowledge but always left decisions up to us. Both Briddick and Jillian were great at communicating and answering all our questions.

google_reviews.author: Taryn Edwards
google_reviews.review: Right before COVID my family and I strongly considered moving to the Bellingham area. We contacted Briddick Webb and he gave us a wonderful tour of the various neighborhoods, toured a couple open homes, and answered all our questions about relocating. Unfortunately we are no longer in the market for a new home (life is too uncertain and unstable right now!) but I want to give a shout out to Briddick and his team. Professional, courteous, and all around awesome is how they've been. If you're looking to start a relationship with a realtor that is more than a transaction consider Briddick Webb Real Estate.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much Taryn! Hope you guys are well

google_reviews.author: Matthew Twohey
google_reviews.review: Briddick and Jillian are a great team. Briddick is an attentive agent who listens to his clients dreams and does his best to make it happen. He is supportive and not at all pushy as he truly is an agent who works for his clients.

google_reviews.author: Dylan Langei
google_reviews.review: I have worked with Briddick on multiple occasions, where he has been on the buying and selling end of the transaction. Talk about the all around perfect realtor who just gets it. He can work with a multitude of people and adapt to various personalities and needs - which is important as a realtor. He is also knowledgeable and works FOR the client, not for himself. If you want to buy or sell your next home, this is your guy. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

google_reviews.author: Hanna Bowler
google_reviews.review:
My husband and I went to an event Briddick and some of his colleagues were hosting regarding the house buying process, loans & insurance. When we were ready to purchase our home a year later, we met with him one on one and knew he was the right person to help us.

Unfortunately, the path to closing on our house was extremely stressful due to a few big factors connected to the seller and seller's agent. We regularly questioned if this house was worth all of the trouble. On top of all of that, I was newly pregnant when we started our house search with Briddick. After 1 month of searching, 2 months of trying to make the sale happen and 2 months of construction we finally moved in..2 months before the baby came.

This sale was a lot of work for Briddick, more than it was probably worth but he committed to us and went out of his way to help us. There were so many times when we needed him to take care of the issue at hand and he did, without hesitation or attitude. Briddick is a solid human being and excels at his job. We consider him a friend and will always choose him for any real estate adventures in the future.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much Hanna. Hope you guys are doing awesome!

google_reviews.author: Devan Boucher
google_reviews.review: Briddick and his assistant, Jillian, were both extremely instrumental in finding our first home. Even in an incredibly competitive market, they were always sending us available homes within our search criteria and they fought tooth and nail to make sure we were getting a good deal when we did eventually have an offer accepted. We are very thankful for them!

ownerResponse.text: It was so great working with you both Devan!!! So excited we could help you get into your first home in this insane market!!

google_reviews.author: Tessa Jarvis
google_reviews.review: Briddick's team is second to none when it comes to real estate. A leader in the business, Briddick is always on the forefront of Real Estate with innovative marketing, exceptional client care, and skillful negotiation. Working from a solution solution-based mindset, he listens carefully to his clients needs, and carves a path forward. You'll be in good hands with Briddick!

google_reviews.author: Rhys Webb
google_reviews.review: Briddick and Jillian ( his assistant) were very professional and helpful in the process of selling my family home. They answered difficult questions and provided great advertising for the listing. I would recommend them in a heartbeat for anyone who needs assistance in the real estate market for Whatcom County.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much uncle! It was pleasure working with you.

google_reviews.author: Dennis Imhof
google_reviews.review: Briddick Webb and his team are a pleasure to work with! I have done 3 projects with him and each one went smoothly. He is very knowledgeable and a pleasure to work with. I can always count on getting my questions answered quickly and he is always available. I would highly recommend him to anyone needing a real estate professional.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you Dennis. It was a pleasure working with you and hanging out!

google_reviews.author: David Schiff
google_reviews.review: Briddick Webb and his sales associate, Jillian Hawley, were fantastic in facilitating the smooth, quick sale of a single family home that was made somewhat complicated by the fact that it was owned by my PENSCO IRA Trust.   The house needed some repairs prior to being put on the market and they arranged all the right reasonably priced contractors to do the work.   I live in California and never had to go to Bellingham or even the bank for any part of the process.   Everything was handled remotely by telephone calls, text messages, emails and online document signing.   Communication was frequent and appropriate.   I have never met them in person!   However if I needed to sell another home, I would do it with Briddick and Jillian!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for the kind words David!

google_reviews.author: Nicholas Chamley
google_reviews.review:
It is not difficult to sell a home in Bellingham these days, and the least one could expect from a realtor is a decent, moral human that cares for the emotional wellbeing of seller and buyer in addition to simply making a sale.
Briddick's initial sale fell through when he failed to inform the buyers that the seller died by suicide. The buyers learned this when flipping a mattress on closing day, despite close friends of the deceased offering to dispose of the bed to protect the emotional wellbeing of future owners.
When the widowed partner contacted Briddick inquiring of the possibility of purchasing the home where she planned to raise a family, Briddick explained that a backup sale was in the works, and promptly asked if she was interested in an alternative property in the Bellingham area.
The emotionally inept, insensitive, and greedy behaviors of this individual should not be tolerated in our beloved Bellingham community.

ownerResponse.text:
This apparent widowed partner who obviously is one who wrote this review contacted us 3 weeks after the property had gone on the market.

She had ample time to make an offer and never contacted us or any other agent until it had already sold. Her details of the initial fail sale are misinformed and she sounded both disturbed and distressed on the phone so much so that we notified the Estate of this peculiar behavior. The Estate had never heard of this person until his passing.

We have helped hundreds of buyers and sellers over the last 11 years professionally and respectfully. We take tremendous pride in our service.

The fact this individual wrote this review under someone elses name should be an immediate red flag.

google_reviews.author: Jim Waterhouse
google_reviews.review:
It would be impossible to fully credit Briddick, and his team including Jillian, BJ, and all of the allied professionals which came together to help us realize our dream home and community.
Our life situation was filled with stress and deep anxiety related but not limited to the pandemic. The one area of our lives which was steady, kind and professional was each and every member of the team and all our interactions with them. Questions were always answered quickly and with care to be accurate, clear and detail-oriented.

There was such a genuine interest and desire to know us all in ways which yielded great returns. He consistently and patiently heard us, diligently searched both listed and soon to be listed properties, and in the end found us just what we wanted. His referrals and hometown knowledge helped us throughout the process. I will be giving my unqualified and enthusiastic recommendation to any and all of my family and  friends considering a move here. If that is you then do yourself the favor of letting this team have your back. If you've made the decision to move to our new home, Bellingham, you couldn't do any better than Briddick and this team!

google_reviews.author: Alex Langford
google_reviews.review: Briddick is a excellent real-estate agent, he was quick and professional with every aspect of selling our house. I would highly recommend him to anyone looking to buy or sell a home.

google_reviews.author: Lynda Gadd
google_reviews.review:
Fantastic realtors! Jillian was so awesome, going above and beyond.  Briddick and Jillian helped us navigate the current challenging market to help us purchase two properties.  They made sure that all of our questions were answered and that we were completely satisfied with our transactions.
Highly recommend!

google_reviews.author: Neal Swanson
google_reviews.review: Briddick possesses a rare combination of a knowledge based professionalism with an easy going attitude. I'm confident that referring someone to Briddick will result in professional representation with a friendly approach. It has been a pleasure working with him.

google_reviews.author: Austin Neufeld
google_reviews.review: Briddick is awesome! He is an excellent communicator and always puts his clients first. If you're looking for someone with high integrity and a great work ethic Briddick's your guy.

google_reviews.author: Cliff Brown
google_reviews.review: Briddick, Tessa, and Jillian make an excellent team.  From the realtor selection process thru to closing they have been professional, responsive, and friendly.  This has made the stressful task of selling our home a fond experience.  CB

google_reviews.author: Andrea Glazier
google_reviews.review:
Briddick & his team are honest, straightforward and have great communication.
I used his services when I bought and sold my home.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much Andrea! It was a pleasure and we will miss seeing you at the Pig Roast in the summers...

google_reviews.author: Tom O'Hara
google_reviews.review: We had to do our house hunting from 2300 miles away. Briddick and his office did everything they could to help us visualize  the house, over and above the information on the internet. The process was very smooth.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Tom. It was a pleasure helping you and Venus!

google_reviews.author: MissPennyUnWise
google_reviews.review: My name is Mrs Munn and Briddick Webb helped me sell my property. His crew were very Professional, courteous and made the whole process extremely fast and simple. Id highly recommend them. They are amazing!!!! Thank you so much

ownerResponse.text: It was an absolute pleasure working with you!

google_reviews.author: nick webb
google_reviews.review: Brid and his wife Sandi are local and experts in this market.  They helped me every step of the way and made finding and buying a home easy.  When I had questions - they always had answers.

google_reviews.author: Kendra Wagner
google_reviews.review: Briddick and Julian were excellent (and tolerant of my dumb questions), and they really know the Bellingham culture and real estate market well.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for review Kendra. You were a delight to work with and all of your questions were valid.  Congrats on the new condo. We are neighbors

google_reviews.author: Luke Humphrey
google_reviews.review:
Called about land. He repeated a bunch of stuff I already knew. Said hed go take pictures and let me know about price. I asked a follow up question about road noise. Never heard back from him. Land went pending to another buyer.
Didnt seem motivated and wasnt helpful.

UPDATE: This agent just texted me a week later and called me an a%#%* for writing this review. Yep. Avoid.

ownerResponse.text: Luke,  I emailed you a ton of documents and never heard back from you. Sorry it didn't work out. Hope you were able to find something.

google_reviews.author: Steve Webb
google_reviews.review: Briddick and RE/MAX in bellingham provide an excellent service to buyers and sellers. I couldn't be prouder. - Steve Webb

google_reviews.author: justin uyttewaal
google_reviews.review: Highly recommended! Hard working and knowledgeable agent/staff who were always available (any day/time) for our needs.  Very fortunate to have had them during our home buying process.

ownerResponse.text: It was so great to meet you guys and get to assist in your purchase!

google_reviews.author: Diana Heiman
google_reviews.review: Briddick goes above and beyond! We couldn't be more pleased with the service we received from Briddick Webb and his Re/Max team.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for the kind review Diana!  Can't wait to see you guys in your new beautiful home!

google_reviews.author: Jane Relin
google_reviews.review: Briddick did a great job for me. Did background research to ensure success.  Everything went very smoothly.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Jane! It was a pleasure

google_reviews.author: Paul Lever
google_reviews.review: We've used the office for two transactions. Very on top of it, good communications and a practical approach to closing.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks so much Paul. Cant wait to see more photos from your incredible adventures.

google_reviews.author: Frank Youngblood
google_reviews.review: Great!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you, Frank! We thoroughly enjoyed working with you, your assistance certainly helped get the transaction closed as smoothly as possible :)
Thanks Lutfi!
